pullrequest.title: Updated IMU sensor to support six generic noise models

content.raw:
This pull request makes both forms of noise parameters acceptable, so we do not need a conversion from 1.4->1.5. We will have to do a conversion from 1.5->1.6, but we don't have SDF 1.6 yet.

We can add the deprecated flag, as discussed in issue #98, in the future. At that point, we can update the converter to automatically convert from 1.4 noise to 1.5 noise.
content.html:
This pull request makes both forms of noise parameters acceptable, so we do not need a conversion from 1.4->1.5. We will have to do a conversion from 1.5->1.6, but we don't have SDF 1.6 yet.

We can add the deprecated flag, as discussed in issue #98, in the future. At that point, we can update the converter to automatically convert from 1.4 noise to 1.5 noise.
